SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap

Class IMAPConnection

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.LineBasedConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.IMAPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelHandler
public class IMAPConnection extends LineBasedConnection
Connection handler for the IMAP4rev2 protocol. This manages one IMAP session over a TCP connection, handling command parsing, authentication, and mailbox operations according to RFC 9051.

IMAP Protocol States (RFC 9051 Section 3):

  • NOT_AUTHENTICATED - initial state, authentication required
  • AUTHENTICATED - logged in, can list/select mailboxes
  • SELECTED - mailbox selected, can access messages
  • LOGOUT - connection closing
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • RFC 9051 - IMAP4rev2

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from class: Connection
      Closes the connection gracefully. For SSL connections, sends close_notify before closing. The actual close happens after netOut is flushed by SelectorLoop.

      close in class Connection
